description: Retrieves the encrypted administrator password for a running Windows instance.

incidents.description: Tales from the cloud trenches: Amazon ECS is the new EC2 for crypto mining
Behind the scenes in the Expel SOC: Alert-to-fix in AWS
When a Zero Day and Access Keys Collide in the Cloud: Responding to the SugarCRM Zero-Day Vulnerability
Compromised Cloud Compute Credentials: Case Studies From the Wild

securityImplications: Attackers might use GetPasswordData to retrieve the password data for Windows instances, allowing unauthorized access.
